clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of SMS Reminder and Free Eye Drops on Follow-up Adherence After Trabeculectomy Surgery in Rural China
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized Controlled Trail to Determine the Impact of a SMS Reminder Associated With Free Eye Drops on Follow-up Adherence After Trabeculectomy Surgery in Rural China

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the study is to use a randomized controlled design to determine the impact of a SMS messaging associated with free eye drops intervention on the following outcomes among patients after trabeculectomy surgery in rural China.

detailed_description.textblock: SMS message reminder is a system which can sent re-visit information to remind the patient about the revisit time and address. The investigators can use the SMS system to find out if it is a useful to reduce the not-attended rate of the revisit appointment among the rural patients.

primary_outcome.description: Compare the SMS and free eye drops patient not-attend rate with the control group to show the impact of SMS reminder associated with free eye drops on the adherence with scheduled follow-up visit

secondary_outcome.measure: Knowledge and Attitudes about glaucoma, glaucoma surgery and importance of follow-up using a questionnaire
secondary_outcome.description: Using a questionnaire to compare Knowledge and Attitude between the SMS associated with free eye drops group and the control group

secondary_outcome.measure: Additional factors potentially associated with post-operative follow-up using a patient questionnaire
secondary_outcome.description: Using a patient questionnaire to compare between the SMS associated with free eye drops group and the control group

arm_group.arm_group_label: SMS and free eye drops group
arm_group.description: the patient after trabeculectomy surgery in the SMS associated with free eye drops group will receive free eye drops and a SMS reminder message about the revisit time.
the patient after trabeculectomy surgery in the control group won't get any free eye drop and reminder message before the appointment.

intervention.description: The SMS reminder message will sent to the SMS associated with free eye drops group patients 1 week and 1 day before there appointment to remind them the exact time and address of the revisit appointment.The eye drops will be offered free to the the SMS associated with free eye drops group patients when they revisit on time.
intervention.arm_group_label: SMS and free eye drops group

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All the patients after trabeculectomy surgery in 4 cooperated rural hospitals
Exclusion Criteria:
- Both the patient and his/her caretakers don't have cellphone or the one who has cellphone but don't know how to use the SMS function.
